verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [V: singled] out [ARG1: Republican Sen. John McCain] [ARGM-TMP: this morning] [ARGM-PNC: as] [ARGM-CAU: the reason that he was unable to fulfill a campaign pledge to repeal and replace Obamacare more than a year after taking office] .
